Text: I hope people who read this don't take all these fantasies and hallucinations for reality of after death existence, then they would really be idiots...
It is for idiot's, for one thing. And I will write my experience when I am about to die, that may be an addition to this book.
As one who has experienced an NDE firsthand, I advise you not to speak things of about which you are completely ignorant.  There is more to life than you think you know.

There are good neurological explanations for these experiences. Some operating theatres have a word written up near the ceiling which could only be seen from above- just in case. Unsurprisingly no patient has ever read one, even if they claim to have had an "NDE".
My NDE was when her husband fired a few shots at me. Missed, fortunately.
For all those twats that like to criticize shit, i hope you have a near erection experience  someday
